content: r26-29 single_crochet around 30 r30 *decrease 3sc* x6 24 r31 single_crochet around 24 start stuffing continue as you go r32 *decrease 2sc* x6 18 r33 *decrease 1sc* x6 12 r34-35 single_crochet around 12 r36 flo *increase 1sc* x6 18 r37 *increase 2sc*x6 24 r38 *increase 3sc*x6 30 r39 *increase 4sc* x6 36 r40 *increase 5sc* x6 42 r41-46 single_crochet around 42 r47 *decrease 5sc*x6 36 r48 single_crochet around 36 r49 *decrease 4sc* x6 30 r50 *decrease 3sc* x6 24 r51 *decrease 2sc* x6 18 r52 *decrease 1sc* x6 12 fo weave in ends © june lee hooker 2018 6 ears make 2 r1 mr4 4 r2 *increase 1sc*x2 6 r3 *increase 2sc*x2 8 r4 *increase 3sc*x2 10 r5 *increase 4sc*x2 12 r6 *increase 5sc*x2 14 fo leave long tail for sewing snout with white yarn r1 chain 6 turn and work 3sc in second chain from hook 1sc in next 3 work 3sc in next stitch and 1sc in last 3 on the other side of the chain insert stitch marker here r2 increase in next stitch half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet slip_stitch in next 3 sts half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet increase in next st slip_stitch in next 3 fo leave long tail for sewing assembling see close up pictures for reference place snout on the middle of the face pin & sew place ears on top of head pin & sew with white thin thread embroider eyes © june lee hooker 2018 7 this pattern is
